recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with tomato sauce, ground beef, and spices.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic, and cook until softened.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Add the canned tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Drain the spaghetti and toss with the sauce.
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese on top.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Quick and easy stir-fry with chicken, vegetables, and a flavorful sauce.
ingredients: 500g boneless, skinless chicken breast, thinly sliced
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, and chicken broth.
In a large skillet or wok, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add the chicken and cook until no longer pink.
Add the bell peppers, onion, and garlic, and cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour the sauce mixture over the chicken and vegetables, and cook for 2-3 minutes until sauce thickens.
